With the current state of the game there's no way I can recommend it.  Match making takes around 6 minutes if you're playing solo and even longer if you're playing with friends.  Almost 2k hours and while it is very addicting and fun at first it quickly turns into a massive sweat fest.  Match making will give you anywhere from rank 20 to rank 1 for both sides almost every game so if you're new you will get bullied by higher ranks.  The game is littered with bugs that the devs know about and have sat on for months and every single new patch breaks several things in the game.

Avoid until the devs maybe fix the game.
fdhdfshdfh

I've been playing this on console for over a year and a half, and just recently got it for PC. My only complaint about now being on PC is the lack of cross progression/cross skins, but as for game play, it will be neat to see how long it takes to start from square 1 again. Playing solo is fun, but playing with friends is even better. Don't know anyone who plays yet? Definitely look for discord groups etc, as there are so many!

Recomendo, é divertido, mas o jogo é um 50/50, ou vc vai se divertir muito, ou vc vai passar mais raiva doq jogando uma ranqueada no lol, as vezes vc vai cair com pessoas legais q so tão ali pra jogar e as vezes vc cai com uns babacas toxicos, sempre que uma partida acabar e vc começar a ser xingado no chat, 90% das vezes é um boludo espanhol sendo toxico, o jogo é bom, se vc jogar de killer claro, pq survivor só se fode, quando vc n ta sendo tunelado e tomando facecamp vc ta contra o souzasoul de nurse te derrubando em 5 segundos, as vezes vc vai cair com umas pessoas normais (mas é raro), vc passa a partida inteira fazendo gerador pra ver seus teammates te abandonando no final pq o killer tinha noed, se for jogar de survivor eu recomendo jogar com amigos ou um time fechado logo, pq jogar solo é masoquismo, de killer é mil maravilhas até vc ser loopado infinitamente, ficar tão puto q insiste na chase, e quando finalmente pegar a pessoa tomar um flashlight save pq vc foi burro e n olhou pra parede, os killers iniciais não são tao divertidos quanto os pagos, enfim, se vc quer se divertir nesse jogo, joga de killer pq tem mais chance, se tiver com amigos até da pra jogar de survivor, mas pra se divertir mais pra frente quando vc começar a subir de rank vc vai ter q gastar um dinheirinho no jogo pq as perks boas são todas de killers bloqueados, então é isso.

Jedes Spiel, egal ob Killer oder Überlebender, fühlt sich unfair und frustrierend an. Beide Seiten sind überaus toxisch im Verhalten und im anschließenden Chat. Das implementierte Matchmaking funktioniert für mich aktuell nicht, besonders auf Killer Seite. Ich fange z.b. einen Killer ganz neu an, ich habe Ihn noch nie vorher gespielt und komme dann an Überlebende, die alle mit den aktuellen Meta Perks ausgerüstet sind und die die Generatoren innerhalb von 2 Minuten fertig haben. Gefühlt ist jedes Match eine Niederlage.

Nachtrag: Die Toxizität der Community steigt und steigt und steigt. Es machte eigentlich nur Spaß wenn man in einer Gruppe im Voice spielte, aber seit dem letzt Patch ist das auch vorbei. Killer tunneln und campen.
Der einzige positive Aspekt ist, das dass Lobby erstellen schneller geht. Das Matchmaking ist immer noch wertlos, aber es kommen schneller Lobbys zusammen, das ist doch was.

Are you into Masochism? Hate yourself? Well boy-o boy, have I got the game for you. With more salt than the Dead Sea in just the after game chat, Dead by daylight is sure to kill that pesky ego of yours. Want to feel immersed in Youtube simulator? Well when the killer tunnels and camps you and your fellow survivors leave you to die, youll feel right at home watching the game rather than playing! Want to play running simulator? We've got that too, with killer, youll be paired with only the reddest of ranks for all your running leads as they treat you like a nice little puppy leading you on a walk in the middle of the entities realm. What are you waiting for? Bring that deodorant and prepare for the most sweaty times youve ever had! If you didnt want to kill yourself before playing this game then you will afterwards!
good game
